content.question: ​The rational function <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x to the power of 4 minus x squared over denominator x cubed minus 2 x squared plus x end fraction"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>. Which of the following input values corresponds to a hole in the graph of <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="x equals 1"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math> only

<math alttext="x equals negative 1"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, ​<math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 1"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
